Question: On June 20, 2006, CBS News and Sports president Sean McManus announced that this person would leave the network after 44 years.
Hints: On February 28, 1962, this person left Houston for New York City for a six-month trial initiation.
Shortly after Iraq invaded Kuwait, this person secured an interview with Iraqi leader Saddam Hussein.
During the presidency of Richard Nixon, critics accused this person of biased coverage against President Nixon.
